###  **California's Fiscal Cliff**

California's structural budget deficit has reached an unsustainable inflection point. The state faces an $18 billion gap in 2026-27, but the real problem emerges after: a $35 billion annual structural deficit by 2027-28. Revenue is growing, but it's fully consumed by mandatory spending from Prop 98 (schools/colleges) and Prop 2 (reserves/debt), both of which auto-scale with revenues. Rainy day funds are depleted, debt deferrals exhausted, and one-time measures exhausted.

[Read the full analysis](news.html?article=california-fiscal-outlook-2025)

### **Sunset Song**

<a href="media.html#sunset-song"><img src="https://media.themoviedb.org/t/p/w500/loBR4Qm16d0gtaCJ7T1gknMtK4f.jpg" alt="Sunset Song" style="width: 60px; height: auto; float: left; margin-right: 10px;"></a>

A Scottish farmer's daughter comes of age in rural Scotland during WWI, navigating love, hardship, and the grinding social pressures of class and tradition. Terence Davies adapts Lewis Grassic Gibbon's novel into a haunting meditation on personal sacrifice and historical upheaval.
